title: Constant Disconnecting
body: So recently for the past week, 2 weeks in almost every game I end up disconnecting constantly. I log into league, get a game started, get out of champ select and into a game without a hitch. When I get in the game, it goes maybe 3m without any problem. After that roughly every 5 minutes I am disconnected from the game, and the "Attempting to Reconnect" square pops up. I get back in the game after 30 seconds of waiting, and continue on. 5 minutes later it happens again. It may just be me, but it generally seems to happen at more or less critical points, such as when enemy does dragon/baron, or is pushing a tower I can easily save. I've messaged support about it, they game me a list of fixes, none worked. Anyone else with this problem/with a solution? Help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body: Been getting this constantly myself...at wits end dealing with this issue.
ive been having this issue for a week. every game, except 2 right after i reinstalled the game. pretty sure im getting reported in these games.
